title: Blockchain Expert Explains Why He Holds XRP
description: On September 29, Panos Mekras, a well-known blockchain consultant and financial technology expert, explained why has invested in $XRP. Mekras is the Founder of DigitalGen Financial Services, Co-Founder of Anodos Finance, and the author of “Understanding the Crypto Economy: A Full Guide for Beginners.” Mekras says he holds XRP due to its promising potential, rooted […]

title: Biggest Movers: LINK Races to 2-Month High, SOL Extends Gains
description: Chainlink rose for a fourth straight day to start the weekend, as the price surged by as much as 7% in today’s session. title: Can Binance Coin (BNB) Compete With Pikamoon’s 100x Potential?
description: BNB investors are in a dilemma as they eye the mouthwatering 100x profit potential Pikamoon promises to rake in for its early investors in 2023.
